mapper.insert: insert into board (title, addr, phone, food,hm,filename) values (#{title},#{addr},#{phone},#{food},#{hm},#{filename})
mapper.delete: delete from board where title=#{title} and num = #{num} and food = #{food}
mapper.select: SELECT B.num, B.title, B.addr, B.phone, B.likeCnt, AVG(M.star) AS avg_star, B.commentCnt, B.food, B.hm, B.filename FROM board B LEFT OUTER JOIN comment M ON B.num = M.bno WHERE B.food = #{food} GROUP BY B.num, B.title, B.addr, B.phone, B.likeCnt, B.commentCnt, B.food, B.hm

SELECT b.num, b.title, b.addr, b.phone, b.likecnt, (SELECT AVG(c.star) FROM comment c WHERE c.bno = b.num) AS avg_star, b.commentCnt,b.food, b.hm FROM board b INNER JOIN likeboard l ON b.num = l.bno WHERE l.id = #{id}

SELECT b.num, b.title, b.addr, b.phone, b.likecnt, (SELECT AVG(c.star) FROM comment c WHERE c.bno = b.num) AS avg_star, b.commentCnt,b.food, b.hm FROM board b INNER JOIN comment c ON b.num = c.bno WHERE c.commenter = #{commenter}
